content: crochet prayer shawl v_stitch designed by v noël lópez hookdudewest materials hook size 5 5mm worsted weight yarn medium #4 yarn needle & scissors size 18 in x 64 in choose your length/width skill level beginner intermediate gauge = 6 v-stitches equals 4in and 9rows equals 4in however i don t believe that it s that important for this project abbreviations double_crochet double_crochet chain chain st s stitch es 2dc grp 2 double_crochet group repeat repeat * repeat action following asterisk instructions chain loosely 50 chains row 1 - 2dc in 4th chain from hook * skip 1 chain 2dc in next chain this will create the v_stitch or 2dc group repeat from * to last 2 chain skip 1 chain 1dc in last chain chain 3 & turn row 2 - * 2dc in center of 2dc grp repeat from * to end of row 1dc in the 1st chain from your foundation chain below ch3 & turn row 3 - * 2dc in center of 2dc grp repeat from * to end of row 1dc in 3rd chain of turning chain ch3 & turn repeat row 2 & 3 to the desired length fasten_off and weave in ends optional add fringe if desired on ends of shawl thank you for choosing my pattern note there are several variations of v_stitch including putting 1 chain between the 2 double_crochet s double_crochet chain double_crochet you can modify this pattern according to your preference copyright © 2014 hdw no part of this document should be reproduced without prior consent of the author you may use the information found here to make products for personal use sell or charity purposes
